title: Volcanoes, earthquakes, and other earth movements
creator_credit: Reinald Werrenrath Jr and Goldberg-Werrenrath Productions
brief_description: Indicates that volcanoes and earthquakes are evidence of a natural process called plate tectonics. Shows how to chart part movements of these crustal plates and how to make predictions about their movements. The program also uses excellent location film such as the eruption of the Mt St Helens volcano in Norther America. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
